author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, in partial response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45370#issuecomment-2301200925. 

#### PR validation:

Most of the tests now run correctly: `scram b runtests` of the changed packages.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
Cc: @srimanob
title: fix a bunch of failing unit tests after D88 and D92 went missing
